tensordb.TensorClient.delete_tensor¶

TensorClient.delete_tensor(path: str, only_data: bool = False) → Any¶

Delete the tensor

Parameters
only_data: bool, default False

If this option is marked as True only the data will be erased and not the definition

tensordb.TensorClient.upsert tensordb.TensorClient.exist
